snippet: The New York Times appointed Alex MacCallum, a founding editor of The Huffington Post, an assistant managing editor for audience development.
abstract: New York Times names Alexandra MacCallum as new editor to its leadership team, creating newsroom role to oversee expanding the paper’s audience and deepening its engagement with readers.
lead_paragraph: The New York Times appointed Alex MacCallum, a founding editor of The Huffington Post, an assistant managing editor for audience development.

headline.main: Times Names New Editor for Outreach
headline.print_headline: Times Names New Editor for Outreach
